question: Tax filing requirement
text:
Tax filing requirement
          
        
The minimum amount (or threshold) of income requiring you to file a federal tax return. 
2019 filing requirements for most taxpayers:
 Gross income of at least $12,200 (individuals) or $24,400 (married filing jointly). Different thresholds apply for dependents, people 65 and older, and those who use other tax filing statuses (like married filing separately).
Note: If you have received 
Advance Premium Tax Credits (APTC)
, or if you are claiming the premium tax credit, you must file a federal income tax return.
